languages.text: {n}Механические пальцы Торианы сжимают бумагу, оставляя на ней грубые вмятины.{/n} "Официально высокофункциональные сервиторы есть в услужении лишь у моего рода. Если такие единицы нападут на Вольного Торговца, то в первую очередь заговорщиками посчитают дом Гапрак. Полагаю, Версерианы хотели подставить нас, но не учли, что у сервиторов при себе будет это письмо".

traits.locale_text: {n}Механические пальцы Торианы сжимают бумагу, оставляя на ней грубые вмятины.{/n} "Официально высокофункциональные сервиторы есть в услужении лишь у моего рода. Если такие единицы нападут на Вольного Торговца, то в первую очередь заговорщиками посчитают дом Гапрак. Полагаю, Версерианы хотели подставить нас, но не учли, что у сервиторов при себе будет это письмо".
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: {n}Toriana's mechanical fingers grip the paper.{/n} "Officially, high-functioning servitors are employed by my house and my house alone. If such units were to attack the Rogue Trader, suspicion would instantly fall upon the Gapraks. I assume that this is what the Werserians intended to happen, but they did not expect that the servitors would have this letter on them."

Полагаю, Версерианы хотели подставить нас, но не учли, что у сервиторов при себе будет это письмо".

languages.text: {n}托丽安娜的机械手握住了字条。{/n}“从明面上看，我的家族确实拥有高智能型机仆，而且只有贾帕克家族拥有这样的机仆。如果这些机仆袭击了行商浪人，那贾帕克家族会立刻成为第一个遭到怀疑的对象。我认为，韦尔森家族对这样的结果喜闻乐见，但他们却没想到，那些机仆身上居然会带着这封信。”
languages.original_text: {n}Toriana's mechanical fingers grip the paper.{/n} "Officially, high-functioning servitors are employed by my house and my house alone. If such units were to attack the Rogue Trader, suspicion would instantly fall upon the Gapraks. I assume that this is what the Werserians intended to happen, but they did not expect that the servitors would have this letter on them."

traits.locale_text: {n}托丽安娜的机械手握住了字条。{/n}“从明面上看，我的家族确实拥有高智能型机仆，而且只有贾帕克家族拥有这样的机仆。如果这些机仆袭击了行商浪人，那贾帕克家族会立刻成为第一个遭到怀疑的对象。我认为，韦尔森家族对这样的结果喜闻乐见，但他们却没想到，那些机仆身上居然会带着这封信。”
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: {n}Torianas mechanische Finger umklammern das Papier.{/n} "Offiziell gibt es hochfunktionale Servitoren nur in Diensten meines Hauses. Würden solche Einheiten {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} angreifen, würde der Verdacht augenblicklich auf die Gapraks fallen. Ich gehe davon aus, dass die Werserians genau das erreichen wollten, sie aber nicht damit gerechnet haben, dass die Servitoren diesen Brief bei sich tragen würden."
languages.original_text: {n}Toriana's mechanical fingers grip the paper.{/n} "Officially, high-functioning servitors are employed by my house and my house alone. If such units were to attack the Rogue Trader, suspicion would instantly fall upon the Gapraks. I assume that this is what the Werserians intended to happen, but they did not expect that the servitors would have this letter on them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Torianas mechanische Finger umklammern das Papier.{/n} "Offiziell gibt es hochfunktionale Servitoren nur in Diensten meines Hauses. Würden solche Einheiten {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} angreifen, würde der Verdacht augenblicklich auf die Gapraks fallen. Ich gehe davon aus, dass die Werserians genau das erreichen wollten, sie aber nicht damit gerechnet haben, dass die Servitoren diesen Brief bei sich tragen würden."
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: {n}Les doigts mécaniques de Toriana se referment sur le papier.{/n} « Officiellement, seule ma maison emploie des servitors ultra-performants. Si de telles unités attaquaient {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, il ne fait aucun doute que tous les soupçons se tourneraient automatiquement vers les Gaprak. J'imagine que c'était là l'objectif des Werserian. Ils ne devaient pas s'attendre à ce que les servitors gardent cette lettre sur eux. »
languages.original_text: {n}Toriana's mechanical fingers grip the paper.{/n} "Officially, high-functioning servitors are employed by my house and my house alone. If such units were to attack the Rogue Trader, suspicion would instantly fall upon the Gapraks. I assume that this is what the Werserians intended to happen, but they did not expect that the servitors would have this letter on them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les doigts mécaniques de Toriana se referment sur le papier.{/n} « Officiellement, seule ma maison emploie des servitors ultra-performants. Si de telles unités attaquaient {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, il ne fait aucun doute que tous les soupçons se tourneraient automatiquement vers les Gaprak. J'imagine que c'était là l'objectif des Werserian. Ils ne devaient pas s'attendre à ce que les servitors gardent cette lettre sur eux. »
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: {n}Los dedos mecánicos de Toriana sujetan con fuerza el papel.{/n} «Oficialmente, mi casa es la única que usa servidores con gran funcionalidad. Si unidades como esa atacaran a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, las sospechas recaerían inmediatamente sobre los Gaprak. Imagino que los Werserian tenían intención de que así fuera, pero no contaban con que los servidores llevaran encima la carta».
languages.original_text: {n}Toriana's mechanical fingers grip the paper.{/n} "Officially, high-functioning servitors are employed by my house and my house alone. If such units were to attack the Rogue Trader, suspicion would instantly fall upon the Gapraks. I assume that this is what the Werserians intended to happen, but they did not expect that the servitors would have this letter on them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los dedos mecánicos de Toriana sujetan con fuerza el papel.{/n} «Oficialmente, mi casa es la única que usa servidores con gran funcionalidad. Si unidades como esa atacaran a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, las sospechas recaerían inmediatamente sobre los Gaprak. Imagino que los Werserian tenían intención de que así fuera, pero no contaban con que los servidores llevaran encima la carta».
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: {n}トリアーナの機械仕掛けの指が紙を掴んだ。{/n}「公式には、高機能サーヴィターは私の家のみで雇われています。その様な者たちが自由開拓者に攻撃を仕掛けたら、直ちにギャプラック家が疑われます。きっと、これがウェルザリアン家の狙いだった。しかし、まさかサーヴィターがこの手紙を持っているとは、思ってもいなかったのでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Toriana's mechanical fingers grip the paper.{/n} "Officially, high-functioning servitors are employed by my house and my house alone. If such units were to attack the Rogue Trader, suspicion would instantly fall upon the Gapraks. I assume that this is what the Werserians intended to happen, but they did not expect that the servitors would have this letter on them."

traits.locale_text: {n}トリアーナの機械仕掛けの指が紙を掴んだ。{/n}「公式には、高機能サーヴィターは私の家のみで雇われています。その様な者たちが自由開拓者に攻撃を仕掛けたら、直ちにギャプラック家が疑われます。きっと、これがウェルザリアン家の狙いだった。しかし、まさかサーヴィターがこの手紙を持っているとは、思ってもいなかったのでしょう」
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: {n}Toriana'nın mekanik parmakları, kâğıdı tutuyor.{/n} "Yüksek işlevli hizmetörler, resmiyette yalnızca bizim hanemizce kullanılır. Bu birimler, Hür Tacir'e saldıracak olsa şüphe doğal olarak Gaprak Hanesi'ne düşerdi. Zannımca Werserian Hanesi mensuplarının niyeti de buymuş. Fakat bu mektubu hesaba katmamışlar."
languages.original_text: {n}Toriana's mechanical fingers grip the paper.{/n} "Officially, high-functioning servitors are employed by my house and my house alone. If such units were to attack the Rogue Trader, suspicion would instantly fall upon the Gapraks. I assume that this is what the Werserians intended to happen, but they did not expect that the servitors would have this letter on them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Toriana'nın mekanik parmakları, kâğıdı tutuyor.{/n} "Resmiyette yüksek işlevli hizmetörler yalnızca bizim hanemizce kullanılır. Bu birimler Hür Tacir'e saldıracak olsa şüphe doğal olarak Gaprak Hanesi'ne düşerdi. Zannımca Werserian Hanesi mensuplarının niyeti de buymuş. Fakat bu mektubu hesaba katmamışlar."
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak
